(and therefore suppressed from the list of Approval Statuses).</p>                                                             |
| [position](./models.approvalstatus.position.md)                 |           | number \| undefined                                                   | <p>Position of this Approval Status in the list of the Approval Statuses.</p><p>The list of Approval Statuses is ordered, because Publication Targets can have a minimal Approval Status: Approval Statuses with a Position lower than this minimal approval status won't be publishable.</p> |
